glossary.name: bronze key
glossary.text: I don't have a lock like this in my apartment...
glossary.title: bronze key

glossary.name: I don't like this room
glossary.text: This room doesn't belong here. I don't like it. It's dark and there's something in here.
glossary.title: I don't like this room

glossary.name: I don't know this room
glossary.text: This room doesn't belong here. I don't know it. None of this stuff is mine and I only recognize some of it.
glossary.title: I don't know this room

glossary.name: television
glossary.text: All the entertainment and none of the jam...
glossary.title: television
